TFloatImage Struct Reference
[Class FloatImage]

An image containing pixels of type FLOAT32. More...

FLOAT32 ** ppMatrix
FLOAT32 * pPixelStream
FLOAT32 ** ppAllScanLines

Detailed Description

An image containing pixels of type FLOAT32.

Always remember to call kF_InitFloatImage() after creating a variable of this type.

See also:
TFileInfo , TStatistic
